SELECT rp.key_ as flowKey, rp.id_ as id, rp.deployment_id_ as deploymentId, rp.name_ as name, rp.category_ as category, rp.version_ as version, rp.suspension_state_ as suspensionState, rd.deploy_time_ as deploymentTime FROM act_re_procdef rp INNER JOIN ( SELECT key_, MAX(version_) AS max_version FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF GROUP BY key_ ) tmp ON rp.key_ = tmp.key_ AND rp.version_ = tmp.max_version LEFT JOIN act_re_deployment rd ON rp.deployment_id_ = rd.id_
AND rp.name_ LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY rd.deploy_time_ DESC
